effects: May cause digestive issues in some individuals.

effects: Potential carcinogenic properties in high concentrations.
May cause skin and eye irritation in some individuals.
Linked to increased inflammation and oxidative stress.

effects: May cause allergic reactions in sensitive individuals.
Potential link to hyperactivity in children's behavior.

Maltodextrin.description: Starch-derived ingredient used as filler and thickener.
effects: May cause digestive discomfort in individuals with IBS.

Linked to an imbalance in gut bacteria composition.
